title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 604.3 - Records access officer and records access appeals officer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 604.3 - Records access officer and records access appeals officer

State Regulations
(a) The records access officer shall be the
individual(s) designated by section
603.4
(a) of this

Title. (b) All requests to inspect, amend and/or copy records (see section
604.12
of this Part) subject to
disclosure as provided by this Part are to be made to the appropriate records
access officer (see section
604.12
of this Part). (c) The records access appeals officer (see
section
604.12
of this Part) shall be
responsible for processing any appeals resulting from the provisions of this

Part. (d) The
records
access appeals officer
shall mean the Counsel of OPWDD whose business
address is: Counsel's Office, Office for People With Developmental

Disabilities, 44 Holland Avenue, Albany, NY 12229. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
604.3

Amended

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
